thread.title: What’s your #KamStand? Pick a side as Seahawks safety Kam Chancellor continues his holdout
thread.title_full: What’s your #KamStand? Pick a side as Seahawks safety Kam Chancellor continues his holdout | The Seattle Times

author: Nick Eaton
title: What’s your #KamStand? Pick a side as Seahawks safety Kam Chancellor continues his holdout
text:
After holding out all preseason for a more lucrative contract, Seahawks strong safety Kam Chancellor will miss Sunday’s season opener against the Rams in St. Louis.
Chancellor, who is signed with Seattle through 2017, has dug in hard; he wants some of the money due to him in 2017 shifted to 2016. But the team appears unwilling to budge, not wanting to set a precedent that players can successfully ask for more money whenever they want.
Kam Chancellor is continuing his holdout as the Seahawks open their season Sunday in St. Louis. (Jeff Gross / Getty Images) Take Our Poll For a more detailed look into Chancellor’s holdout, read this explanation from Seahawks beat reporter Bob Condotta.
Where do you stand when it comes to Chancellor’s holdout? Should he end his campaign and return to the team? Or should he get what he wants?
Show your support — for either side — with these Facebook and Twitter profile images. Just right-click to download, then upload to Facebook or Twitter on your own.
